title: What our users say
subtitle: Testimonials from people who are already taking control of their finances with Bilio

testimonials.quote: Bilio has changed the way I manage my money. I finally have control of my finances without having to use complicated apps.
testimonials.author: Ana López

testimonials.quote: Being able to register my expenses through WhatsApp is wonderful. Daily notifications help me keep my finances under control.
testimonials.author: Carlos Mendoza

testimonials.quote: Finally a financial app that I don't find tedious to use. The weekly reports are super useful for identifying where I overspend.
testimonials.author: María Torres
